title: Force per unit length acting on two wires

content.question: Two long, straight, current-carrying wires are parallel to each other in the plane of the page and separated by a distance a, as shown above. The direction of the current I in each wire is toward the top of the page. Which of the following best represents the force per unit length acting on the wires?

choices.label: A repulsive force of magnitude <math> <semantics> <mrow> <msub> <mi>μ</mi> <mn>0</mn> </msub> <msup> <mi>I</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>/</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>a</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeGacaakiaakoabaaa aaaaaapeGaeqiVd02damaaBaaaleaapeGaaGimaaWdaeqaaOWdbiaa dMeapaWaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaaGOmaaaakiaac+cacaaIYaGaeqiWda Naamyyaaaa@425D@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

A repulsive force of magnitude <math> <semantics> <mrow> <msub> <mi>μ</mi> <mn>0</mn> </msub> <mi>I</mi><mo>/</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>a</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeGacaakiaakoabaaa aaaaaapeGaeqiVd02damaaBaaaleaapeGaaGimaaWdaeqaaOWdbiaa dMeacaGGVaGaaGOmaiabec8aWjaadggaaaa@414B@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

An attractive force of magnitude <math> <semantics> <mrow> <msub> <mi>μ</mi> <mn>0</mn> </msub> <msup> <mi>I</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>/</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>a</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeGacaakiaakoabaaa aaaaaapeGaeqiVd02damaaBaaaleaapeGaaGimaaWdaeqaaOWdbiaa dMeapaWaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaaGOmaaaakiaac+cacaaIYaGaeqiWda Naamyyaaaa@425D@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

An attractive force of magnitude <math> <semantics> <mrow> <msub> <mi>μ</mi> <mn>0</mn> </msub> <mi>I</mi><mo>/</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>a</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeGacaakiaakoabaaa aaaaaapeGaeqiVd02damaaBaaaleaapeGaaGimaaWdaeqaaOWdbiaa dMeacaGGVaGaaGOmaiabec8aWjaadggaaaa@414B@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>

content.answer: An attractive force of magnitude <math> <semantics> <mrow> <msub> <mi>μ</mi> <mn>0</mn> </msub> <msup> <mi>I</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> <mo>/</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>π</mi><mi>a</mi></mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeGacaakiaakoabaaa aaaaaapeGaeqiVd02damaaBaaaleaapeGaaGimaaWdaeqaaOWdbiaa dMeapaWaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaaGOmaaaakiaac+cacaaIYaGaeqiWda Naamyyaaaa@425D@ </annotation> </semantics> </math>
